pages.text: Z yikhnimy ochamy prynyzheni, vony vytikayutʹ z graves lyublyatʹ rozihnani saranu
Tomu shcho vony vidpovidayutʹ do caller, disbelievers skazhutʹ, "Tse ye tyazhkyy denʹ
lyudy Noah disbelieved pered tym, yak yim. Vony disbelieved nash sluzhbovetsʹ ta skazav, "Bozhevilʹnyy!" Vin peresliduvavsya
Vin blahav yoho Lorda, "ya pryhnichuyusʹ; harantuyte meni peremoha
My todi vidkryly bramy neba, l'yuchy vodu
Ta my vyklykaly pruzhyny khlynuty z zemli. Vody zustriti do efektu predetermined rishennya
My perevezly yoho na watercraft zroblenyy kolod ta kanativ
Tse pobihlo pid nashymy watchful ochamy; vynahoroda dlya odnoho khto buv vidkynutyy
My vstanovyly tse yak urok. Budʹ-yake bazhannya vas dovidatysya
Yak strashnyy Miy retribution pislya poperedzhenʹ
My zrobyly Quran lehkyy dovidatysya. Budʹ-yake bazhannya vas dovidatysya

My poslaly na nykh nasylʹnytsʹki viter, na dni bezperervnoho neshchastya
Tse shpuryalo lyudey navkolo tak, yakby vony decayed korpusy dereva palʹmy

Thamoud vidkhylyv poperedzhennya
Vony skazaly, "Budutʹ my slidkuyemo odni z nas; lyudsʹkyy? My todi zablukayemosʹ, todi zakinchuyemosʹ u Pekli
povidomlennya prybulo vnyz yomu, zamistʹ nas? Vin ye ochevydnyy brekhun
Vony znaydutʹ zavtra khto ochevydnyy brekhun
My posylayemo verblyudu yak test dlya nykh. Sposterihayte yikh ta patsiyent
